title: Divine Diamond Kasu Mala: A Modern Take on Tradition
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with meticulously set Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Features signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting radiance. Diamond clarity: VS
features: This exquisite necklace reimagines the traditional Kasu Mala. It features a delicate floral motif chain, leading to ornate mango-shaped 'Paisley' pendants studded with dazzling diamonds, interspersed with single round gold drops. The central pendant showcases a larger, more elaborate floral design, enhancing the necklace's focal point. The setting ensures maximum brilliance and secure stone placement.
colors: Radiant Yellow Gold complemented by the icy brilliance of the White Diamonds
creating a timeless and elegant color palette.
occasions: Sankranthi and Ugadi. Its refined design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and special events. A stunning statement piece for the modern bride or the discerning jewelry connoisseur.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The exceptional diamond quality ensures breathtaking sparkle and enduring value. Expert craftsmanship guarantees a piece that will be treasured for generations, making it a heirloom in the making. Exudes understated elegance and timeless appeal.
